plot: US government agents Ken Maynard and Hoot Gibson, aka &"The Trail Blazers&", make a deal with captured outlaw Duke Dillon to catch crooked Indian agent John Hampton, who has been using his authority to steal from the local tribe. Dillon double-crosses the inept and lethargic heroes, making it difficult for them to carry out their mission.   Written by  Doug Sederberg
title: The Law Rides Again
plot_es: US government agents Ken Maynard and Hoot Gibson, aka &"The Trail Blazers&", make a deal with captured outlaw Duke Dillon to catch crooked Indian agent John Hampton, who has been using his authority to steal from the local tribe.
